text: A few days before the start of this #GunViolenceAwarenessMonth a gunman killed 19 children & two teachers in the Uvalde school shooting. That's just one of the over 200 mass shootings in the U.S. this year. Thoughts & prayers are never enough. We need ACTION to #EndGunViolence. http
On #MemorialDay we remember the ultimate sacrifice made by servicemembers in defense of our country. We are forever indebted to them for their bravery and courage and that of their families. http

Lead ammunition and lead sinkers have taken a devastating toll on eagles and other wildlife. That's why we're urging @user and @user to ban the use of lead ammunition to curb lead poisoning on national wildlife refuges. Our letter: http

No American should ever have to go without the care they need especially our seniors. This #OlderAmericansMonth we remain committed to increasing support for home and community-based services so all seniors can receive the caregiving they deserve no matter what.
